This game has been out 5+ Years and still:

1) Has Matchmaking Bans.

2) Has Tiers for perks.

3) Endless Bugs.

4) Terrible MMR system that everyone hates.

5) Unbalance on both sides.

As a survivor main, its easy to get upset when you feel like some killers can be extremely OP, but in the end the game is a great experience that can be loads of fun, especially when playing with people you know!
I like this game. Community a little... But hey the games good.

Didnt play for a few months, game went from buggy and small to growing and consistent (for the most part AKA hunter hacket hit boxes) but good ass game. Rank one killer an dont regret the time i poured into it,
esta bueno, pero hay muchos tryhards.
esta bueno es un toque repetitivo pero esta muy divertido para jugar con amigos

Vuelvo a dejar una rese√±a luego de obtener otras 400 horas de juego.. Y la verdad estoy muy decepcionado, toda la ilusion que tenia sobre un equipo de desarrollo que prestaba atencion a los jugadores se fue por la basura. El juego actualmente es solo sacar mas y mas skins para vender y un nuevo killer/surv cada 3 meses. No mejoraron mas el perfomance general del juego, ni los problemas de balance, ni de toxicidad... 

El mayor problema ahora mismo es el balance y las premades que utilizan sistemas o midificaciones externas para obtener ventajas, sean apps como Discord, TS, Whatsapp, como tmb modificaciones a la pantalla que les da ventaja, como modificar el brillo con filtros, o la pantalla alargada, todo causando un desbalanceo total para el lado de los asesinos (Los cuales, se supone son los protagonistas del juego).

I had played this game years ago when it released. With the halloween season upon us, I decided to dig back into this game since it seemed there was still an active player base. I spent a total of about an hour on the game and didn't get to play a single match. I spent 5+ min searching for a matchmaking server. Eventually I finally connected to one, other players shortly joined after, and then i spent another 3 minutes at the loading screen only to be booted off with an error code saying that a player had disconnected before the server loaded everyone in. Save your money until they get the matchmaking issues sorted.

an amazing multiplayer game that still has plenty of input from the developers. with new crossplay features this game wont die for a long time. the gameplay is great, survivors are tense to play as but satisfying when you win and the playing as the killing is equally rewarding when going up against a good team of survivors.

Honestly one of my favorite games out there it is very fun to play for hours. However, toxic kilers/survivors ruin the game sometimes, but its's a small price to pay for a great game. I can't wait to play for many, many more hours. Edit: This game is still very fun ,however, the queue times can be long. This game should win a steam award because it has been constantly worked on, and the developers are very kind.

Scarry... at first. but than it is REALLY FUN!!!  100% reccomend. but when lag hits its bad!!!

It's a really good game, but of course for new players it can be a mess mainly because whether you are killer or survivor, you need to put in a lot of time and effort to understand how the game works and ways to put your brain to the test to out smart you opposition. This Game is fun playing solo but if you have some friends its would be even better was you will play as survivor and try to help each other escape from the never ending cycle to not be dead by daylight. Don't be discouraged if your new, don't worry the entity will take care of us... I think. [Player] Hours into the game: 186  Occupation main: Survivor
This game got me absolutely hooked. (pun intended)
